name: Soulcatcher (DylanStil, gimunia, Matheus klein, Mohilly, Ruolus, Dr. Tob)
name_original: Soulcatcher (DylanStil, gimunia, Matheus klein, Mohilly, Ruolus, Dr. Tob)
description:
You're Grim Reaper going across the underworld to save lost souls by bringing them back to their mortal bodies. Souls will join together with their own bodies when doing so. They then grant you more abilities to use to help the other souls.  Think you can take up the challenges of the underworld and bring peace to the afterlife?

** CREDITS **

Matheus Klein ~ SFX

Tob ~ Character

Emre ~ Game Tester, Game Design

Gimunia ~ Music
Mia Mohac ~ Environment/UI art
Dylan Stilwell ~ Systems Design/Programming, UI Design

Extra assets used:

Ugly Byte ~ font

Freesounds.org ~ sounds
